ministry.name: FrontLine College & Career
ministry.overview: The College and Career group of Calvary Austin

long-description.p: For married and singles, age 18 to 30-something
FrontLine is a group that offers Christianity at all levels, including:

A. Accountability (PlumbLine)
B. Bible Study (FrontLine)
C. Childcare
D. Discipleship (DirectLine)
E. Evangelism (LifeLine)
F. Food, Fun, and Fellowship
